snippet: No. 1 North Carolina gradually pulled away in the second half to beat visiting Fairfield, which stayed in the game longer than expected by hitting 10 3-pointers.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; University of North Carolina defeats Fairfield University, 92-65, in their home opener; other college basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: No. 1 North Carolina gradually pulled away in the second half to beat visiting Fairfield, which stayed in the game longer than expected by hitting 10 3-pointers.

headline.main: Tar Heels Win 14th Straight Home Opener
headline.print_headline: Tar Heels Win 14th Straight Home Opener
